channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WhatsApp rolls out new group chat features, including member tags
item.description: You can choose a tag that gives others in the group chat more context about who you are.

item.title: Shopify competitor Swap raises $100M six months after raising $40M
item.description: VC firms DST Global and Iconiq are piling into e-commerce startup Swap Commerce, which is going up against Shopify.

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery rejects Paramount’s bid again, calls it a ‘leveraged buyout’
item.description: The studio's board unanimously rejected Paramount Skydance's revised $108.4 billion bid, calling the proposal a "leveraged buyout" that would saddle t...

item.title: Discord’s IPO could happen in March
item.description: Discord reportedly filed confidential IPO paperwork and has pinned its hopes on a debut in March.

item.title: Spotify now lets you share what you’re streaming in real time with friends
item.description: You can tap a friend’s listening activity to play the track, save it, open the menu, or react with an emoji.

item.title: Breville Luxe Brewer Review (2025): Good Drip, Real Cold Brew
item.description: Like a lot of Breville's best devices, the Luxe Brewer combines technical sophistication with easy single-button operation.

item.title: How Quilt solved the heat pump’s biggest challenge
item.description: Quilt's heat pumps are built containing a suite of sensors, which have delivered mountains of data that allow its engineers to wring added performance...

item.title: Where VCs think AI startups can win, even with OpenAI in the game
item.description: Vanessa Larco, partner at Premise and former partner at NEA, thinks 2026 will finally be the year of consumer AI. Larco, who’s been investing in consu...

item.title: Lux Capital lands $1.5B for its largest fund ever
item.description: The 25-year-old firm is an early investor in Anduril, Applied Intuition, and Runway AI.

item.title: AMC previews its new show, ‘The Audacity,’ focused on Silicon Valley
item.description: As one of the show's actors, Billy Magnussen, noted, "Silicon Valley is one of those times in our modern era which is defining humanity. And what bett...
